description: This header file declares memory management functions related to a low memory pool for the Duktape JavaScript engine, likely used in the command line interface or related components.

methods.name: lowmem_free
methods.description: Frees the low memory pool resources.

methods.name: lowmem_dump
methods.description: Outputs the current state of the low memory pool for debugging.

methods.name: lowmem_register
methods.description: Registers the low memory pool with a given Duktape context.

methods.name: lowmem_start_exec_timeout
methods.description: Starts a timeout for script execution to prevent hangs.

methods.name: lowmem_clear_exec_timeout
methods.description: Clears the execution timeout for scripts.

methods.name: lowmem_alloc_wrapped
methods.description: Allocates memory within the low memory pool with a wrapper.

methods.name: lowmem_realloc_wrapped
methods.description: Reallocates memory within the low memory pool with a wrapper.

methods.name: lowmem_free_wrapped
methods.description: Frees memory within the low memory pool with a wrapper.
